Random Hexamers (100 µM)
Viral RNA/DNA extract

source.description:
For each saliva sample recieved add equal volume saliva and 2X DNA/RNA Shield from the Quick-DNA/RNA Viral magbead kit and vortex. Centrifuge the samples at
to bring down debris.

Add
1X DNA/RNA Shield supplemented with
of Proteinase K (20mg/mL) to each sample.
Briefly mix by using a plate shaker at
for
and incubate
at
.

Remove
of MagBinding Beads per sample of the stock and place on a magnet stand. Incubate for
or until the beads have pelleted and the supernatant is completly clea. Then while avoiding the bead pellet, carefully remove the clear supernatnat. Resuspend the beads in
of Viral DNA/RNA Buffer (2-Mercaptoethanol 0.5% (v/v)) per sample and vortex to fully resuspend

source.body: 2-Mercaptoethanol is toxic, causing irritation to the nasal passageways and respiratory tract upon inhalation, irritation to the skin, vomiting and stomach pain through ingestion, and potentially death if severe exposure occurs.
